availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Brownlee (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Green County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah F. Spilman Brownlee in Green County, Kentucky, on October 19, 1849. Father of William George Brownlee, James A. Brownlee, Robert S. Brownlee, John E. Brownlee, Henry M. Brownlee, and Thomas Brownlee. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Farmer in Green County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 120A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 544.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 1, pp. 426A-B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Green County, KY, September 1863, p. 11.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 000595013.
